bib.title: Combining machine learning and social network analysis to reveal the organizational structures
bib.author: Nurek, Mateusz and Michalski, Rados{\l}aw
bib.abstract: Formation of a hierarchy within an organization is a natural way of assigning the duties, delegating responsibilities and optimizing the flow of information. Only for the smallest companies the lack of the hierarchy, that is, a flat one, is possible. Yet, if they grow, the introduction of a hierarchy is inevitable. Most often, its existence results in different nature of the tasks and duties of its members located at various organizational levels or in distant parts of it.
